thread.title: Pouring Fresh Goat Milk in Bedouin Camp in Feynan, Jordan

author: Gary
title: Pouring Fresh Goat Milk in Bedouin Camp in Feynan, Jordan
text:
Pouring Fresh Goat Milk in Bedouin Camp in Feynan, Jordan 
Camera NIKON D300S Aperture f/5.3 Exposure Time 1/80 
In 2013 I returned to Jordan and had a chance to visit the Feynan Eco Lodge , which is one of the most awarded Eco Lodges in the world. During my stay we visited one of the local Bedouin families where I was served a fresh glass of goat milk. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
